Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, near the Southern Entrance to Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: The Southern Entrance to Oceancrest is just south of Golden Dolphin Way. Although security is fairly lax, not just anyone may enter the city without the proper papers in order. Leaving the city is just as important, as without the proper papers, you may not be able to get back in. On the east, there is a rowdy-looking tavern called "The Rusty Nail Saloon", which appears to be filled with drunk travelers having a drink before continuing on the road. To the west is a large center known as Leonardo's Foundry, where metals may be converted to useful weapons and armor for sale.
